title: A executor to install a package

printConfig.description: Print the commands that would be run, but don't actually run them

cleanFs.description: Delete the file after killing the process

environmentRoot.description: The root directory for the environment

releaseTarget.description: The target to run to release the package

optionsOutputPathKey.description: The key in options specifying the output path of the build target

filePath.description: The path to the file to kill the process for

pid.description: The process id of the running process
